duties_responsibilities.duty: Performing maintenance and repairs on various heavy-duty equipment such as forklifts, loaders, skid steer, and maintenance trucks.
Ensuring safety standards are met and following safe work procedures.
Operating mobile equipment for test purposes and conducting vehicle inspections.
Performing routine maintenance, adjustments, and repairs on heavy machinery and equipment.

education_certification.credential: 3-5 years' experience as a Heavy-Duty Mechanic
